Lyric:
[by:LEFTWords]
[00:04.05]Love it's hard, I know
[00:10.99]All your lights are red, but I'm green to go
[00:18.45]Used to see you high, now you're only low
[00:26.10]All your lights are red but I'm green to go
[00:32.68]I want you
[00:34.44]I'll colour me blue
[00:36.05]Anything it takes to make you stay
[00:39.60]Only seeing myself
[00:41.37]When I'm looking up at you
[00:47.44]I want you
[00:48.83]I'll colour me blue
[00:50.82]Anything it takes to make you stay
[00:54.37]Only seeing myself
[00:56.26]When I'm looking up at you
[01:04.07]I can't say no
[01:10.83]Though the lights are on
[01:12.54]There's nobody home
[01:18.20]Swore I'd never lose control
[01:24.40]Then I fell in love with a heart that beats so slow
[01:31.73]I want you
[01:33.36]I'll colour me blue
[01:35.16]Anything it takes to make you stay
[01:38.55]Only seeing myself
[01:40.39]When I'm looking up at you
[01:46.24]I want you
[01:48.10]I'll colour me blue
[01:49.95]Anything it takes to make you stay
[01:53.14]Only seeing myself
[01:55.38]When I'm looking up at you
[02:02.03]I know you're seeing black and white
[02:06.52]So I'll paint you a clear blue sky
[02:10.01]Without you I am colour-blind
[02:13.07]It's raining every time I open my eyes
[02:17.62]I know you're seeing black and white
[02:21.13]So I'll paint you a clear blue sky
[02:24.89]Without you I am colour-blind
[02:27.78]It's raining every time I open my eyes
[02:32.21]I want you
[02:34.42]I'll colour me blue
[02:37.75]Only seeing myself
[02:39.72]When I'm looking up at you
[02:43.49]When I'm looking up at you
[02:45.83]I want you
[02:47.14]I'll colour me blue
[02:48.96]Anything it takes to make you stay
[02:52.10]Only seeing myself
[02:54.56]When I'm looking up at you
[03:00.44]I want you
[03:01.84]I'll colour me blue
[03:03.75]Anything it takes to make you stay
[03:06.89]Only seeing myself
[03:09.34]When I'm looking up at you
[03:14.91]I want you
[03:16.76]I'll colour me blue
[03:18.56]Anything it takes to make you stay
[03:21.71]Only seeing myself
[03:24.14]When I'm looking up at you
